body:
This PR generates a full repository assessment across 15 categories (A-O), achieving an overall score of 9.7/10.

Key changes:
- Executed `scripts/run_assessment.py` for all categories.
- Generated individual reports in `docs/assessments/`.
- Created `docs/assessments/Comprehensive_Assessment.md` with weighted scoring.
- Updated `scripts/generate_assessment_summary.py` to ensure 5 recommendations are outputted.
- Code style verified with `ruff` and `black`.

The lowest score is 7.0/10 for Maintainability (O), due to detected large files ("God Classes"), while all other categories scored 10/10. No critical issues requiring immediate action were found.
